3.name: Old Fashioned
3.description: Made by muddling sugar with bitters, then adding alcohol, originally whiskey but now sometimes brandy, and finally a twist of citrus rind

4.name: Moscow Mule
4.description: Vodka, spicy ginger beer, and lime juice, garnished with a slice or wedge of lime

5.name: IPA
5.description: A hoppy beer style within the broader category of pale ale

6.name: Pale Ale
6.description: An ale made with predominantly pale mal

7.name: Stout
7.description: A dark beer, typically 7% or 8% alcohol by volume

8.name: Sour Beer
8.description: An intentionally acidic, tart or sour taste

12.name: Water
12.description: The best thing on the planet
